price: O Vjerovjesniče, Mi smo te poslali kao svjedoka i kao donosioca radosnih vijesti i kao poslanika koji opominje,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
